title: Softened sweet onion and crisp fried fish
description: Nadiya says that fish is the star of Bangladeshi cooking. You can use any white fish for this recipe, in which it is coated in gentle spices and quickly fried. It's important to be patient with the onions to ensure they caramelise without burning.
ingredients: 3 tilapia fillets, sliced lengthways (alternatively, you could use cod, haddock or any white fish fillets)
